transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello good afternoon sir.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Sir Shubham bol raha tha India Mart se subah baat hui thi na aap se to aapne bola tha 3 baje call karne ke liye.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: To sir dekhiye kya hai jaise aapne mujhe bataya ki jo sales team ne aapko seal kiya tha theek hai aur jo jo cheeze boli thi aapko theek hai to maine kya kara hai wo issue escalate kar diya hai kyuki dekhiye abhi seal ho gayi to hamari servicing team ke paas proper aata hai ki servicing team head office se servicing karti hai aapki proper tarike se theek hai jaise aapko Anjali ne bhi bola hoga sir aap ek baar video meet pe aa jayiye fir ek baar discuss kar lenge jo bhi cheeze hai dikkate aa rahi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai to but is cheez ko main jaane nahi deta usko escalate kiya hai to jo bhi team hai wo connect karegi jinhone aapko sale kiya wo connect karega aur jo bhi aap se bola hai wo provide karaegi theek hai jaisa bhi rahega but sir ek cheez ye rakhna ki sir sales to ho gayi lekin servicing ka part dekhe aap hume chance dijiye aisa nahi ki nahi hota pura all over India India Mart level pe jo bhi hai sari services head office se hoti hai Noida se.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai sir to wo cheez hai to wo cheez hum log yahan se manage karenge aapka jo issue hai main isko isliye escalate kar diya taki aapko jo hai kya aapko lag raha hai ki aapke sath dikkat galat hua hai wo cheez aapko nahi honi chahiye feel sir theek hai to wo aap ek baar discuss kar kara dunga main aapke discussion jo bhi hoga solution but ek cheez hai sir aap service use karna start kariye thoda sa dekhiye agar aise aapko bataya ki koi dikkat aa rahi hai nahi aa raha hai to uske liye hum log hai back aapko hamesha ek account manager sign hota hai sir wo aapke app mein bhi uska naam number jaisa hai sab dikhega.
Customer: Jab maine itni baat ki hai agar maine unke sath teen se paanch baar baat ki hai tabhi to 10 baje phone aaya.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Nahi dekhiye sir baat to sunenge hi nahi.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir dekhiye main nahi aap bataiye sir dekhiye aapne bataya tha na to wo mujhe sahi acha matlab theek hai aapne bataya to maine isliye turant usko highlight kar diya ki ye galat hua jo bhi cheeze aapko agar kuch cheez boli gayi hai at least batana chahiye agar wo nahi connect kar pa rahe to servicing team ko bata do ki maine ye cheez boli hai aap kara dijiye help kara dijiye sir ko agar nahi aata hai sir ko to jo cheez usme koi dikkat thodi hai.
Customer: Meri baat nahi samjhe jab unka timing jab unko maine bola jab aapne itni baat ho gayi ki aisa aisa hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Matlab ki kya wo jab bhi action hota hai jab main usme comment dalta hu na I am satisfied.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Tab jaake action hota hai waise action nahi ho raha hai aaj aapko char mahine kitni baar action hua hai is cheez pe.
Executive: Nahi sir bilkul sahi baat hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ji ji bataiye.
Customer: Matlab ki main aap service de rahe ho main kaam nahi le raha mere paas koi call aa rahi hai wo main koi utha nahi raha hu.
Executive: Hmm hmm sahi baat hai sir nahi aap baat kar rahe hai proper baat kar rahe hai itni baar phone kiya aapne baat hui aap se sir.
Customer: No sir.
Executive: Theek hai to dekhiye ab wahi cheez hai sir dekhiye main samajh gaya aap aisa aap nahi hoga aapke paas aapke aap na apne account manager ka jo Anjali ji hai unka number save unko direct call.
Customer: Jab aapne paise dene ke baad mein is tarike se baat karenge to mere ko kya maza thodi aayega sir aapke sath sabko.
Executive: Sahi baat hai sahi baat hai sir aapne paisa sahi baat hai sir paisa aapne business ke liye diya hai sir obviously.
Customer: Aur aaj inone mere ko itni baar convince kiya usne mere ko itni baar samjhaya usne kaha bhaiya aisa ho jayega itne dekho itna itna itna aapko lead aayegi maine kaha theek hai ek aadmi do lead working karegi to kaam to karenge lead hi nahi aayegi to kis kaam karenge.
Executive: Haan 17 lead matlab aapko 17 milta hai 17 lead aap consume kar sakte ho ek week mein sir aapka theek hai na jo aapko hum log balance dete hai na credits dete hai to aap 17 lead ek week mein consume kar sakte ho 17 mein se maan lijiye ek do to aapka respond matlab ho sakta hai nikal aaye wo bhi depend karta hai na sir wo market mein to wo koi dikkat nahi but use karenge to kya hota hai proper visibility wagera listing wagera hamara use improve hota hai isse hamare paas call inquiry bhi aata hai theek hai to pura ek cycle hai ek chain hai theek hai agar hum ek cheez band kar denge to dusri cheez affect hogi hogi usme sir theek hai to isme ek kaam karenge sir jaise abhi aapka jo aap jaise bol rahe the all over India deal karte hai na sir isme to aap apne product line mein.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai to dekhiye abhi kya kariye jo discussion hona hai team ke sath wo discussion to hoga hi hoga usko wo usko koi stop nahi kar raha hu wo to maine already escalate kar diya hai team jo jisne aapko sale kara wo connect karega aap se.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hai sir?
Customer: Nahi aapko nahi bol raha.
Executive: Acha acha main keh raha hu jo team hai wo to connect karegi lekin sir uske chakkar mein apna jo time ja raha hai usse usse nahi karte aap dekhiye agar aapke paas time hai.
Customer: Sabse badi cheez hai samay ja raha hai aur hamara season time nikal gaya uske baad mein aap garmi mein aap kisi ko 100 kilo bhi maal nahi bech sakte ho aap.
Executive: Main samajh gaya sir to isliye ab dekhiye isliye main bol raha hu sir aap start kariye aaj se hi agar aap abhi free hai to bataiye main abhi 10 minute mein aapko pura bata deta hu kaise kaise order jo cheeze hoti hai buyer kaise karne ke liye.
Customer: 15 minute.
Executive: Theek hai haan to 15 minute mein aise hi same number pe kar lu na sir aapko ek cheez bataiye sir aapka number kaun sa hai whatsapp number kaun sa hai aapka?
Customer: Ye number hai.
Executive: Yahi number hai ek minute rukiye message kar raha hu line pe.
Executive: Kyuki main aapko number de de raha hu kyuki ye to hamara recording line wagera number hota hai na sir to aap number save rakhiye theek hai kabhi bhi zarurat padti hai to aisa nahi ki aap aapko fir ye search karne ki kahan kisko call karna hai aur ye na Anjali ji jisme baat hui thi unko bhi aapka number unko bhi inko bhi aapko de denge to aap kabhi bhi connect sakte hai dekhiye aapke paas message aaya kya sir?
Customer: Ek whatsapp pe.
Executive: Whatsapp pe yes sir maine apne number se call message kiya.
Customer: Aagaya sir. Nikal aake ek hi bori mein nikle hai koi alag alag maal nahi aaya hai jaise colour wise chata liya.
Executive: 964.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan sir.
Customer: 964.
Executive: Haan sir wahi hai last mein theek hai to aapke paas aagaya ek kaam karta hu Shubham sir Shubham naam hai aur Anjali ka jo proper rahenge na main aapko dikha dunga abhi abhi aap rahenge aap ye bataiye use matlab abhi kis pe karte hai mainly phone pe hi karenge laptop wagera bhi use karenge.
Customer: Call kyun nahi aare mujhe to theek hai wo to main check karunga.
Executive: Main sab bataunga sara bataunga sir aapko 10 minute dijiye mujhe aapko roz roz nahi lunga main jo jo cheeze hai dikkate kaise kaam karta hu main ek baar main aapko proper bata du fir aap uske hisab se kaam kariye sir main aapko dikhaunga isliye abhi chaho to bata sakta hu lekin aaj aap dekhenge samajh mein aa jayega aapko khud ki kya dikkat aa rahi hai kahan nahi aa rahi hai sir theek hai na to wo cheez main karta hu aap 10 minute aap 10 minute mein 15 minute mein call back karta hu fir theek hai aapko connect karunga google meet pe fir discuss karte hai is cheez ko proper tarike se theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads.

- Dissatisfied with post-sales service.

- Feels misled about lead generation promises.



Resolution:

- Executive escalated the issue to the sales team.

- Executive assured proper servicing from head office.

- Executive offered a Google Meet to explain usage.

- Executive shared his contact number.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 10-15 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, customer service, escalation, google meet
